ing: 1/2 small mango - peeled, seeded and diced
1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste
des: "This mango milkshake with banana is great! Add vanilla bean ice cream if you want this to be a really rich drink. If you add too much vanilla ice cream it will start to taste like a vanilla milk shake instead of a mango drink."
ins: Place mango, banana, and ice cream into a blender, and sprinkle with white sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Pour in milk and place the lid on the blender. Blend until smooth, then pour into cups to serve.
